it.polito.dp2.NFFG

Interface NffgVerifier


  • public interface NffgVerifier
    An interface for accessing a set of Network Function-Forwarding Graphs (NF-FGs) and the policies to be verified on these NF-FGs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NffgReader getNffg(java.lang.String name)
      Gives access to a single NF-FG given its name.
      java.util.Set<NffgReader> getNffgs()
      Gives access to the set of known NF-FGs.
      java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies()
      Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified.
      java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies(java.util.Calendar verificationtime)
      Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified, filtered by verification time and date.
      java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies(java.lang.String namenffg)
      Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified, filtered by NF-FG's name.

    • Method Detail

      • getNffgs

        java.util.Set<NffgReader> getNffgs()
        Gives access to the set of known NF-FGs.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading all available NF-FGs.

      • getNffg

        NffgReader getNffg(java.lang.String name)
        Gives access to a single NF-FG given its name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the NF-FG to get (a string made of alphanumeric characters only, where the first character is alphabetic).
        Returns:
        an interface for reading information about the NF-FG with the given name or null if an NF-FG with the given name is not available.

      • getPolicies

        java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies()
        Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading all available policies.

      • getPolicies

        java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies(java.lang.String namenffg)
        Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified, filtered by NF-FG's name.
        Parameters:
        namenffg - the NF-FG for which policies have to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading information about the policies available for the specified NF-FG or null if no policies with the given NF-FG name are available.

      • getPolicies

        java.util.Set<PolicyReader> getPolicies(java.util.Calendar verificationtime)
        Gives access to the set of known policies to be verified, filtered by verification time and date.
        Parameters:
        verificationtime - the starting verification date and time from which policies are considered.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading all the policies that have been verified after the specified date and time or null if no policies with the given date and time are available.
